title: As They Fall
description: "I thought we were safe. I was wrong."  The war was supposed to bring peace, but after almost a century, the divisions are anything but peaceful.  Seventeen year old Bellamy Moore is caught in the middle of the most dangerous war her county has ever faced against an unknown enemy. When the unimaginable happens, Bellamy loses almost everything, including herself.  Then she meets Emmitt Prescott. He's mysterious, charming, and he might just understand what she's going through. Everything she knows to be true is about to change, and as the stakes get higher, Bellamy learns to play a dangerous game in order to protect those she has left. With everything falling apart around her, will she learn who she can trust?
author: Ashley   Stewart
